briefTitle: Health Information Technology (HIT) Enhanced Family History Documentation and Management in Primary Care
officialTitle: Health Information Technology (HIT) Enhanced Family History Documentation and Management in Primary Care
conditions: Colorectal Cancer, Breast Cancer, Coronary Heart Disease, Diabetes
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of Subjects Who Discussed Disease Risk With Primary Care Provider
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adults 18 - 75 Years old
* English or Spanish speaking
* Recent visit to a participating primary care practice

Exclusion Criteria

* No phone number or email address listed in the EHR
